output:
**GST Query Response:**

I understand you're asking about GST: "Getting started with GST"

For detailed GST guidance, I recommend checking the official GST portal or consulting a tax professional.

**Helpful Resources:**
• GST Portal: https://www.gst.gov.in/
• Income Tax Portal: https://www.incometax.gov.in/
• MCA Portal: https://www.mca.gov.in/

**InvoNest Features:**
• Professional invoice templates
• GST-compliant formats
• Payment tracking
• Tax calculations

Feel free to ask more specific questions - I'll do my best to help!
